text: Small, repulsive creatures they were, with black, matted hair and a striking resemblance to the shrunk heads we had gazed at recently; and I have no hesitation in saying that they would have made an end of us but for an intervention so unexpected, so unusual, that only the necessity of rounding my narrative compels me to mention it.
